message: the output html is ugly and not well formated
Why when we look at the output code in the source view browser, there are some blank space betwen
I have no idea what you're talking about.
Middleman is just a static site generator. It doesn't write or edit any of your code in processing so it shouldn't be doing anything with your list items.

Ha, nicely summarised :) —@yauuik If you have empty list items then it's most probably an issue with either your nesting within the list or a problem with your iteration if you're using something like a for/while loop. Give those a check and make sure everything matches in the source code before it is processed.
Well, if you're using ERb is replaces ruby code and sometimes leave behind new lines. It's up to you if you want to sacrifice the readability of your templates to avoid whitespace in the output.
